tenders.title: Supply of Office Furniture and Equipment
tenders.description: The Federal Ministry of Works invites eligible vendors to submit bids for the supply and delivery of high-quality office furniture and related equipment to its headquarters in Abuja. Interested suppliers must demonstrate capacity, relevant experience, and financial capability.

organization.name: Federal Ministry of Works
organization.description: A government body responsible for the construction and maintenance of public infrastructure across Nigeria.

tenders.title: Road Rehabilitation Project – Enugu State
tenders.description: The Enugu State Government seeks qualified contractors for the rehabilitation and resurfacing of selected rural roads. Bidders must be registered construction firms with verifiable experience in civil works.

organization.name: Enugu State Ministry of Works
organization.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining public infrastructure within Enugu State.

tenders.title: ICT Equipment Supply and Installation
tenders.description: The Lagos State ICT Agency invites reputable firms to bid for the supply, installation, and maintenance of ICT infrastructure including servers, networking equipment, and security systems.

organization.name: Lagos State ICT Agency
organization.description: Dedicated to driving digital transformation and technological development in Lagos State.

tenders.title: Provision of Cleaning and Sanitation Services
tenders.description: The Rivers State University invites tenders from qualified cleaning service providers for the provision of cleaning and sanitation services across its campuses for a period of two years.

organization.name: Rivers State University
organization.description: One of Nigeria’s top higher institutions committed to academic excellence and environmental hygiene.

tenders.title: Supply of Laboratory Chemicals and Equipment
tenders.description: The Kano State Polytechnic invites sealed bids from reputable vendors for the supply of laboratory chemicals, reagents, and modern science equipment for its engineering and science departments.

organization.name: Kano State Polytechnic
organization.description: A public institution focused on technical and vocational education, fostering innovation and research.

tenders.title: Construction of Solar-Powered Boreholes
tenders.description: The Kaduna Rural Water Supply and Sanitation Agency (RUWASSA) invites tenders from qualified contractors for the construction of 20 solar-powered boreholes across rural communities in Kaduna State.

organization.name: Kaduna RUWASSA
organization.description: A government agency ensuring access to clean water and sanitation facilities for rural communities.
